message.content:
{
  "id": "14197",
  "title": "Removing a working set immediately makes changes",
  "description": "When a working set is removed, changes are made immediately without any confirmation or prompt.",
  "OB": "1. Create a working set with one project and select it in the package view (the view should be filtered to show only the contents of the selected working set).",
  "EB": "2. Remove the working set.",
  "SR": "The user should be prompted or asked for confirmation before removing a working set, as the removal can cause immediate, irreversible changes to the project's state."
}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '14197', 'title': 'Bug 14197Removing a working set immediatly makes changes', 'description': 'Bug 14197Removing a working set immediatly makes changes ', 'OB': '200204181. create a working set with one project and select it package view is filtered2. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
